Text: Thx! Both versions are very well produced and the ideas they present are fascinating and not unlikely. But to what extent the europeen side really influenced America in this time are uncertain to say the least.
Wonderful to have upped this.  I hope I can get it from someone and it is reseeded.  Thanks.

Well the refugees can go to Asia when it all collapses. Maybe they can get jobs as poolboys and maids in the Philippines. I know I wouldn't hire one, too much training up needed and they're lazy and steal all the time.
